channel.title: Comments on: Adriano Zumbo – 40 Days and Nights in Paris

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Hi everyone Thanks for all your nice comments and it was great meeting all those who went to Zumbo's on that day. Hope everyone gets a chance to go there at least once. I'm looking forward to going again :P
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone
Thanks for all your nice comments and it was great meeting all those who went to Zumbo’s on that day. Hope everyone gets a chance to go there at least once. I’m looking forward to going again ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Pikelet and Pie » Blog Archive » 40 Days and Nights in Paris - Adriano Zumbo Patissier
item.dc:creator: Pikelet and Pie » Blog Archive » 40 Days and Nights in Paris - Adriano Zumbo Patissier

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: I am so jealous. There are so many wonderful places to eat in Sydney. This looks like a great day. I've not managed to 'connect' with any other food bloggers in Brisbane yet. Hopefully one day! :)
item.content:encoded: I am so jealous. There are so many wonderful places to eat in Sydney. This looks like a great day. I’ve not managed to ‘connect’ with any other food bloggers in Brisbane yet. Hopefully one day! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: It was great to meet you on the day. I slowly made my way through all 3 that I took home and the chocolates. I have to go back to try the rest... once I get over the sugar rush :) Hope to see you soon
item.content:encoded:
It was great to meet you on the day.
I slowly made my way through all 3 that I took home and the chocolates.
I have to go back to try the rest… once I get over the sugar rush ðŸ™‚
Hope to see you soon

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: I'm so jealous of anyone that lives in sydney. Everything he makes looks so pretty and delicious! I wish I had one of his stores near me!
item.content:encoded: I’m so jealous of anyone that lives in sydney. Everything he makes looks so pretty and delicious! I wish I had one of his stores near me!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Wow! Those are some impressive dessserts!

item.title: By: Jeena
item.dc:creator: Jeena
item.description: So elegant and delicious, I would love to have brought these fabulous desserts home to eat.
item.content:encoded: So elegant and delicious, I would love to have brought these fabulous desserts home to eat.

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Raarrr that's iittt... I must go this weekend -___-
item.content:encoded: Raarrr that’s iittt… I must go this weekend -___-

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Everything looks like exquisite art work. I don't know how you could bring yourself to eat it, that is if it weren't dessert!
item.content:encoded: Everything looks like exquisite art work. I don’t know how you could bring yourself to eat it, that is if it weren’t dessert!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: The coconut and passionfruit sounds good, and so does the macadamia one. I love the pretty presentation too!
item.content:encoded: The coconut and passionfruit sounds good, and so does the macadamia one. I love the pretty presentation too!
